describe: Saudi Arabia, officially known as the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, is a country in Western Asia constituting the bulk of the Arabian Peninsula. It is known for its vast deserts, rich history, and as the birthplace of Islam.

cities.name: 🏜 Riyadh
cities.geographical_location: Located in the center of the Arabian Peninsula on a large plateau.
cities.climate: Riyadh has a desert climate with extremely hot summers and mild winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Jeddah
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the coast of the Red Sea.
cities.climate: Jeddah has a tropical arid climate with hot summers and warm winters.

cities.name: 🏔 Mecca
cities.geographical_location: Located in the Sirat Mountains in western Saudi Arabia.
cities.climate: Mecca has a desert climate with extremely hot summers and warm winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Dammam
cities.geographical_location: Located on the eastern coast of Saudi Arabia, along the Persian Gulf.
cities.climate: Dammam has a hot desert climate with high humidity in the summer.
